verbose_text: LEF1 and TCF7 promoters were significantly hypermethylated in ALCL tumors compared to AITLs and to normal T cells, but no significant differences in DNA methylation levels were observed between ALCL and PTCL-NOS samples, most likely due to heterogeneity in the PTCL-NOS DNA methylation levels that is reflective of the diversity of this " wastebasket " disease category.
evidence: LEF1 and TCF7 promoters were significantly hypermethylated
